rooms.description: Open-plan area combining living room and kitchen with ample natural light through windows facing the courtyard
Separate dining area adjacent to the living area, with window openings towards the central courtyard
rooms.vastu_compliance: Favorable north-east direction for gathering space

rooms.description: Well-ventilated bathroom near the kitchen area, designed with privacy in mind
rooms.vastu_compliance: South-west placement to avoid negative energy flow

rooms.description: Connecting corridor linking living area, kitchen and dining areas with access to staircases to upper level

openings.description: Main entrance leading into the central courtyard and living area
Secondary access to the open-plan kitchen area and garden space

rooms.description: Master bedroom with private balcony overlooking courtyard
Second bedroom with sufficient space and access to the terrace
Private bathroom attached to master bedroom ensuring privacy
Hallway that connects bedrooms and leads directly to the rooftop terrace

openings.description: Large windows in master bedroom for natural light and ventilation
Door leading from hallway to the rooftop terrace, designed with open space views
